Topic.Title: marcpoh problem 2: MAPS / MEDIC AND CHARACTER ATTRIBUTES / PARTNER FOR MY PROJECTS

Posts.EditableText: hi again ? will someone give me a coding or how to make maps ? my plan for my first project The Dead City is. my character is on his house, and there is survival events, so my character need to go to downtown, other buildings, gardens, even in the roads to next city, please give me intstructions to how i need to do to make different maps, also , it is an survival it needs medic, give me coding for medic that give attributes to my characters, for example, attack, def, and health/HP, for the medic, there is three types, the capsules, the band aid, and the bottle medic with different health attributes for example the capsules only give 20 out of 100 HP, the second one give 50 out of 100 HP and the bottles medic, give 100 out of 100 medics. i need also partners for my projects,
